article:
One day Mary went shopping with her mother. When they got _ the supermarket, Mary was very _ . There were many nice things and many people _ it.
Mary's mother told her to follow her. They walked _ and they _ something for lunch.
When they came to one shelf , Mary _ some boxes of chocolate. Mary wanted her mother to buy some _ her.
Her mother gave her a box of brown chocolate. Mary shook  her head and said " I want a box of white chocolate, mum."
"Why do you want a box of white chocolate?" her mother asked.
" I won't bite my fingers when I eat them at night." Mary answered.
 _ hearing this Mary's mother laughed and they left the supermarket happily.
